CompositeFrame.Name: Deck Plan Example for DOuble DEcker Bus
CompositeFrame.Description: This is an example showing how one might encode a Deck plan for a double decker bus in NeTEx. It includes seat an, entrance and sensor equipment.

StaircaseEquipment.Name: Spiral staircase from deck1 to deck2

TicketValidatorEquipment.ValidationGuidance: Insert ticket into machine to obtain validation stamp

VehicleType.Name: Double Decker Bus
VehicleType.Description: Double decker bus with staircase. Wheelchair and luggage spaces on lower deck.

DeckEntranceUsage.Name: With rear door set open so passengers can alight when stopped in town

ActualVehicleEquipment.Name: Stop button at top of stairs

DeckWindow.Description: Side windows continuous with thin strios
LeftSide windows continuous with thin strips

SchematicMap.Name: Basic Elements for map of bus

ServiceFrame.Name: Deck Plan Assignment Example
ServiceFrame.Description: This is an example showing how one might assign a Deck Entrance to a journey so as to state which entrance will be at which point on the platform . More sense for a train of ferry .

TrainStopAssignment.Name: Board at front from position A
Exit at rear from position A

TimetableFrame.Name: Deck Plan Example
TimetableFrame.Description: This is an example showing how one might assign a deck plan to a journey and also apply conditions.

JourneyPart.Description: Out of to centre doors open

DeckPlanAssignment.Name: Assign double decker bus to Journey - doors shut
Assign double decker bus to Journey - doors open
Assign double decker bus to Journey - doors shut

VehicleJourneyStopAssignment.Name: Ties a STOP ASSIGNMENT to a specific VEHICLE JOURNEY
VehicleJourneyStopAssignment.Description: Will use a specific assignment at a specifc stiop just for this journey
